page.title: 18Employment
page.content: About 12% of the poulation of the Newport on Tay area work locally. Typically their employment is in teaching, merchandising, law and order and ancilliary work in health, home and schools. Of those who work outwith the area may are employed in services such as education, the legal profession, accountancy and various occupations in the health service. Otherwise a great variety of occupations are covered by working people in the area and there is a small amount of voluntary employment in such things as Sunday school teaching and as youth organisation leaders.
